channel.title: Windows on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant
channel.description: Recent content in Windows on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: Tip of the Day: Windows Vista SP2 won't install on a partitioned drive
item.description: Tip of the day: Windows Vista clean install doesn’t work on a partitioned drive AND if you then partition the drive after installing Vista, the SP2 will not install as well.

item.title: Mac OSx Convert - Office tip move between documents
item.description: Here’s a quick one for you - how do you switch between a number of open documents in Word or Excel?

item.title: Virtualbox 3.0.4 Mac OSx How to share folders
item.description: Virtualbox 3.0.4 is a new update released earlier this month. After updating to this new version file sharing between mac os and the guest windows vista has stopped working.

item.title: Ill move to Linux thanks Amarok
item.description: Damien says, one of the biggest problems with Linux has always been a lack of strength in its media players.

item.title: Whats your media player?
item.description: I’m starting a reader survey on Media Players - as there are a few assumptions I wanted to prove or understand.

item.title: HOW TO install Virtualbox on Mac osx host & WinXp guest using TinyXP rev
item.description: Virtualbox is a dream freeware solution for anyone - novice to geek - who wants to run different computers inside their computer - virtual so to speak.
